It also provides fire resistant, armored, fire resistant corrugated, lead and armored, and other instrumentation cables; enameled wires; and OPGW and fiber optic, telecommunication, airport lighting, and fire resistant cables. In addition, the company manufactures pellet cross linked polyethylene and poly-vinyl chloride products; melamine, resin, and melamine sheet products; and plastic and cable reel products. Further, it is involved in the production of copper and aluminum wires and rods. PT Supreme Cable Manufacturing & Commerce Tbk offers its products under the SUPREME brand. The company was formerly known as PT Supreme Cable Manufacturing Corporation Tbk and changed its name to PT Supreme Cable Manufacturing & Commerce Tbk in October 2006. PT Supreme Cable Manufacturing & Commerce Tbk was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

SDMU.JK.summary: PT Sidomulyo Selaras Tbk engages in the transportation and storage of toxic and hazardous chemicals in Indonesia. It primarily transports chemicals, oil, and gas. The company also engages in buying and selling spare parts of trucking vehicles, as well as in the customs clearance, isotank washing and repair, and isotank rental activities. It primarily serves companies operating in the upstream chemical industry that produce basic chemicals for domestic and export markets. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

SKRN.JK.summary: PT Superkrane Mitra Utama Tbk engages in the rental and trading of heavy equipment and accessories in Indonesia. The company leases crawler cranes, crawler telescopic boom cranes, rough terrain and all terrain cranes, truck mounted cranes, and cargo cranes; tele handlers; man lifts and man lifts crawlers; forklifts; scissor lifts; and multi axle products and truck trailers. It also provides lifting and rigging solutions for the construction/infrastructure, maintenance, mining, and petrochemical industries; and heavy construction services and engineering solutions. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Superkrane Mitra Utama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sumi Traktor Perkasa.

SMDR.JK.summary: PT Samudera Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides cargo transportation and integrated logistics services in Indonesia and rest of Southeast Asia, the Middle East, India, and internationally. The company operates through Shipping and Agency, Logistics and Terminal, and Others segments. It also offers container shipping services; container storage, repairs, and related services; and stevedoring and warehousing, freight forwarding, land transportation, and container freight station services. In addition, the company provides cargo inland transport, container depot, warehouse and distribution center, third party logistics, and cold chain and project logistics services; and sales and marketing, and traffic and operations services, as well as offers cargo handling services. Further, It offers agency, ship management and other related, and oil and gas transportation services, as well as supporting services for mining oil and gas, and marine transportation services; property development, trading, and industry services; port management and other port services; and mechanical reparation, maintenance, and wholesale trade services, as well as port supporting equipment. Additionally, the company provides terminal, bulk carrier, tanker, offshore support, third-party logistics, packaging, and project logistics services, as well as inland transportation, and container depot services. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Samudera Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Samudera Indonesia Tangguh.

SOCI.JK.summary: PT Soechi Lines Tbk provides shipping and marine transportation services in Indonesia. The company operates through two segments, Shipping and Shipyard. It charters vessels to the oil and gas, and chemical companies. The company operates a fleet of 35 vessels. It also operates a shipyard, which offers ship maintenance, repair, and overhauling vessels service, as well as new shipbuilding services. In addition, the company provides management and business consulting services; and engages in investment and other business activities. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Soechi Lines Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Soechi Group.

SOSS.JK.summary: PT Shield on Service Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides outsourcing services in Indonesia. It operates through Security Services, Cleaning Services, Human Resource Provider, Parking Services, and Others segments. The company offers security services comprising security management and guarding, security consultancy, corporate and personnel review, and security personnel training services; and cleaning and maintenance services, including daily, full-package, special, and mobile cleaning, as well as landscape/garden maintenance services. It also provides human resource solutions that include talent development, recruitment assessment, and compensation and benefit services; and parking management services, such as parking, valet, car park management, traffic design consultancy, and parking equipment maintenance services. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.

SSIA.JK.summary: PT Surya Semesta Internusa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business. The company operates through five divisions: Construction of Industrial Estates, Real Estate and Rental Buildings, Building Construction, Investment in Other Companies, and Hotels. It engages in the property, development, and management of industrial estates, real estate, buildings, and commercial centers; provision of construction and general contractor services for commercial buildings, mining, and infrastructure; and development and management of hotels and resorts, as well as hospitality and industrial estate development activities. The company owns approximately 10 hotels under the Gran MeliÃ¡ Jakarta and MeliÃ¡ Bali Hotels, Banyan Tree Ungasan Resort, The Plaza Hotel Glodok, and BATIQA Hotels brands. It engages in the rental of office buildings and shopping centers; and trading, development, transportation, agriculture, mining and services, and building construction activities. The company was formerly known as PT Multi Investments Limited and changed its name to PT Surya Semesta Internusa Tbk in 1995. PT Surya Semesta Internusa Tbk was founded in 1971 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

T9Q.F.summary: PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction and other related services primarily in Indonesia. It operates through Construction, and Rental and Others divisions. The company undertakes construction of education, office and religious buildings, high rise residential buildings, hospitals, shopping centers, hotels, utilities, and industrial projects. PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk also provides equipment rental and installation services. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Total Inti Persada.

TAMU.JK.summary: PT Pelayaran Tamarin Samudra Tbk operates as an integrated offshore shipping company in Indonesia. The company's services include offshore marine support services, marine equipment chatering, chartering, re-chartering, accommodation work barge, and anchor handling tug supply services. It serves the oil and gas industry. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Pelayaran Tamarin Samudra Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Andalan Lepas Pantai.

TAXI.JK.summary: PT Express Transindo Utama Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides land transportation services in Indonesia. The company offers regular taxi services under the Express Taxi Regular and Eagle Taxi brand name; premium taxi services under the Tiara Express brand; and value added transportation business services, including limousine rental services under the Limousine Express brand name and bus rental services under the Eagle High brand name. It operates a fleet of approximately 8,000 licensed taxis in the Greater Jakarta area, as well as in other cities, such as Medan, Surabaya, Semarang, Bandung, Bali, and Lombok. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Express Transindo Utama Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Rajawali Corpora.

TBMS.JK.summary: PT Tembaga Mulia Semanan Tbk manufactures, sells, and exports copper and aluminum rods and wires in Indonesia and internationally. The company's Copper Rod and Wire segment engages in the production of copper rods and wires, as well as copper nuggets. Its Aluminum Rod segment produces EC grade rods, alloy rods, and TAL rods. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is based in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.

TCPI.JK.summary: PT Transcoal Pacific Tbk provides sea transport and logistics services in Indonesia. It primarily offers vessel charter and good freight services. The company also provides barging, long hauling, transshipment, oil barge, and agency services, as well as mooring man and oil spill response team services. PT Transcoal Pacific Tbk was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Transcoal Pacific Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sari Nusantara Gemilang.

TEBE.JK.summary: PT Dana Brata Luhur Tbk, a coal logistic company, provides pit to port coal hauling services in Indonesia. The company offers mining infrastructure covering haul roads, provision of stockpile areas, and operation of coal terminals. It also operates a private port for coal loading and blending. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dana Brata Luhur Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Prima Mineral Utama.

TFAS.JK.summary: PT Telefast Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides human resources and telecommunications solutions in Indonesia. It operates through Telco Products and Nontelco Products segments. The company offers HR-KU, a human resources information system application, which facilitates all human resources activities and offers a management system for human resource management for developing companies. Its HR-KU provide various modules, such as attendance, leaves, reimbursement, TAS, employee database and information, internal bulletin, and digital store modules. The company also offers manpower supply solutions; and BILIK KERJA, an application for job providers to recruit and manage employees. In addition, it engages in the trading, services, and tourism businesses. PT Telefast Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2008 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TIRA.JK.summary: PT Tira Austenite Tbk engages in the trading and manufacture of technical products primarily in Indonesia. It operates through three segments: Trading and Distribution of Technical Products; Welding and Molding; and Distribution of Industrial Gases. The company sells various steel products, including machinery steel used for the making of shaft, gear, and other machine parts; and stainless and tool steel products, as well as wear resistant steel products for heavy equipment, liner plate, crusher, and other applications. It also provides medical gases, including anaerobic atmosphere mixtures, blood gas mixtures, breathing air, helium, and lung diffusion gas mixtures; and specialty gases, such as analytical instrumentation mixtures, chemical process gases, emission calibration gases, environmental compliance mixtures, gas mixtures, high purity gas products, hydrocarbon calibration standards, laser gas mixtures, rare gases, and ultra-high purity gas products. In addition, the company offers industrial gases, such as argon, carbon dioxide, nitrogen, oxygen, and hydrogen; fuel gases, including acetylene, LPG, and propane; high-pressure cylinder gases; liquid cylinders for gas or liquid service; and shielding gases. Further, it manufactures bronze casting products under the ALPHABRONZE name; welding electrode products under the name of MG and STELEC; and electronic components, as well as trades in steel. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in East Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Tira Austenite Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Widjajatunggal Sejahtera.

TMAS.JK.summary: PT Temas Tbk. provides sea transportation services in Indonesia and internationally. It transports commodities, such as rice, flour, sugar, cement, and other general cargoes. The company also provides shipping agency services for container, break bulk, general cargo, bulk, ro ro, tanker, and other vessels; and shipping management, logistic, and stevedoring services. In addition, it offers container depot management services, such as stuffing and stripping, container repair, container cleaning that has been returned by customer, and rental of the container handling equipment; and leases containers. The company was formerly known as PT Pelayaran Tempuran Emas Tbk and changed its name to PT Temas Tbk. in August 2019. PT Temas Tbk. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia.

TNCA.JK.summary: PT Trimuda Nuansa Citra Tbk provides air courier services with door to door services under the Garuda Express Delivery brand name in Indonesia. It offers domestic and international courier and cargo services for the delivery of general goods, dangerous goods, medical goods, valuable goods, valuable documents, and shipping using refrigerated trucks. The company also offers freight forwarding and commercial post services, as well as rail, land, sea, and air transportation management services. PT Trimuda Nuansa Citra Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TOPS.JK.summary: PT Totalindo Eka Persada Tbk operates as a construction company in Indonesia. The company engages in the construction of apartments, hotels, shopping malls, factories, superblocks, and commercial buildings. It also constructs public vertical housing projects, as well as public facilities, such as schools, religious buildings, toll roads, and bridges; and develops real estate properties. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Totalindo Eka Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Totalindo Investama Persada.

TOTL.JK.summary: PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction and other related services primarily in Indonesia. It operates through Construction, and Rental and Others divisions. The company undertakes construction of education, office and religious buildings, high rise residential buildings, hospitals, shopping centers, hotels, utilities, and industrial projects. PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk also provides equipment rental and installation services. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Total Bangun Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Total Inti Persada.

TOTO.JK.summary: PT Surya Toto Indonesia Tbk manufactures and sells sanitary wares, fittings, kitchen systems, and other related products in Indonesia and internationally. It offers sanitary wares, including neorests, toilets, lavatories, urinals, bidets, bathtubs, sinks, and washlets; bathroom, automatic, shower, and shower spray fittings, as well as bath spouts, and kitchen and single faucets; and accessories, such as robe hooks, soap holders, toilet paper and towel holders, and towel rings, as well as supplementary and other products. The company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

TPMA.JK.summary: PT Trans Power Marine Tbk provides bulk cargo transportation and handling solutions in Indonesia and Southeast Asia. The company transports bulk commodities, such as iron sand, coal, wood pellets, gypsum, woodchips, clinker, sponge rotary kiln, etc. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a fleet of 74 units, including 38 tugboats, 33 barges, and 3 crane barges. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Trans Power Marine Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dwitunggal Perkasa Mandiri.

TRJA.JK.summary: PT Transkon Jaya Tbk engages in the rental and lease without option rights for cars, buses, trucks, and others. The company rents light vehicles, light trucks and buses, manhauls, ambulance, service bodies, rescue vehicles, and other specialist vehicles. It also provides special vehicles with double and single cabin modification units for service units, palfinger cranes, heavy duty trays, drop side trays, and rescue units; and various accessories. The company serves mining, oil and gas, and construction industries. It also offers internet network, internet and communications, and IT and computer services. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Balikpapan, Indonesia. PT Transkon Jaya Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Damai Investa Sukses.

TRUK.JK.summary: PT Guna Timur Raya Tbk provides land transportation services for customers worldwide. It operates trucks. The company was formerly known as PT Timur Jaya and changed its name to PT Guna Timur Raya Tbk in July 1980. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Guna Timur Raya Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Guna Makmur Raya.

UNTR.JK.summary: PT United Tractors Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, sells and rents heavy equipment in Indonesia. The company operates through five segments: Construction Machinery, Mining Contracting, Coal Mining, Gold Mining, and Construction Industry. The company distributes heavy equipment and spare-parts under the Komatsu, UD Trucks, Scania, Bomag, and Tadano names to mining, plantation, construction, and forestry sectors, as well as for transportation; and offers services in the areas of non-destructive test, full maintenance contract, UT PAP service, machine inspection program, service call, workshop service, tire management system, pit stop management service, fabrication and remanufacturing cylinder, and UT remanufacturing. It also transports coal through river; and distributes tractors, generators, forklifts, and mini excavators, as well as sells commodity parts, as well as operates mini hydro power plant located in Banjarnegara, Central Java. In addition, the company offers mining services that supports coal companies, such as mining design and implementation, preliminary assessment and feasibility studies, construction of infrastructure and plant, removal of overburden and waste, commercial exploitation, expansion of mine/plant, reclamation and revegetation, and transshipment and marketing, as well as owns interests in various coal mine concessions with total estimated coal reserves of 395 million tons. Further, it engages in the engineering, planning, assembling, and manufacturing components of machinery, tools, parts, and heavy equipment; provision of vessel construction and related repair services; provision of vessel charter and shipping services; construction and concrete product businesses; operating power plants; gold mining business; and fishery business. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT United Tractors Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Astra International Tbk.

UTY.F.summary: PT United Tractors Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, sells and rents heavy equipment in Indonesia. The company operates through five segments: Construction Machinery, Mining Contracting, Coal Mining, Gold Mining, and Construction Industry. The company distributes heavy equipment and spare-parts under the Komatsu, UD Trucks, Scania, Bomag, and Tadano names to mining, plantation, construction, and forestry sectors, as well as for transportation; and offers services in the areas of non-destructive test, full maintenance contract, UT PAP service, machine inspection program, service call, workshop service, tire management system, pit stop management service, fabrication and remanufacturing cylinder, and UT remanufacturing. It also transports coal through river; and distributes tractors, generators, forklifts, and mini excavators, as well as sells commodity parts, as well as operates mini hydro power plant located in Banjarnegara, Central Java. In addition, the company offers mining services that supports coal companies, such as mining design and implementation, preliminary assessment and feasibility studies, construction of infrastructure and plant, removal of overburden and waste, commercial exploitation, expansion of mine/plant, reclamation and revegetation, and transshipment and marketing, as well as owns interests in various coal mine concessions with total estimated coal reserves of 395 million tons. Further, it engages in the engineering, planning, assembling, and manufacturing components of machinery, tools, parts, and heavy equipment; provision of vessel construction and related repair services; provision of vessel charter and shipping services; construction and concrete product businesses; operating power plants; gold mining business; and fishery business. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Jakarta Timur, Indonesia. PT United Tractors Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Astra International Tbk.

VOKS.JK.summary: PT Voksel Electric Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells power, telecommunication, and fiber optic cables in Indonesia. It operates through five segments: Power Cable, Fiber Optic Cable, Copper Wire Cable, Contractor Service, and Trading. The company provides bare copper conductors and bare aluminum conductors; and power and control cables, such as high and medium voltage submarine cables, low voltage cross linked polyethylene insulated cable, polyethylene insulated cables, polyvinyl chloride insulated cables, fire resistance cables, flame retardant cables, control and instrument cables, and sheath halogen free cables. It also offers optical fiber cables, which include all dielectric self supporting cables, aerial and duct cables, armor/buried cables, fibre To The Home (FTTH) and Single Core Per Tube (SCPT) cables, air blowing micro duct cables, submarine fiber optic cables, and optical ground wires, as well as supplies free market cables to contractors and distributors. In addition, the company is involved in the general trading, and development and services business; and operates as a general contractor. Further, it exports its products. PT Voksel Electric Tbk was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

W6O.F.summary: PT Wintermar Offshore Marine Tbk supporting services for the offshore transportation for the oil and gas industry in Indonesia, Malaysia, Brunei, Myanmar, Thailand, India, Bangladesh, Papua New Guinea, Micronesia, the Middle East, and Africa. The company operates through three segments: Charter of Own Vessels, Charter of Third Party Vessels, and Other Services. Its fleet includes platform supply vessels, anchor handling tug supply vessels, anchor handling tug vessels, fast utility vessels, fast multi-purpose supply vessels, azimuth stern drive tugs, utility vessels, crew boats, landing crafts, oil barges, heavy load deck barges, and tug boats. The company also offers rig moving and anchor handling, crew change and rig supply, firefighting and emergency rescue, air diving and remotely operated vehicle support, pipe tailing support, seismic survey support services, as well as ship management and other services. It operates a fleet of approximately 48 offshore support vessels. The company was formerly known as PT Swakarya Mulia Shipping and changed its name to PT Wintermar Offshore Marine Tbk in September 2010. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

WEGE.JK.long_name: PT Wijaya Karya Bangunan Gedung Tbk.
WEGE.JK.summary: PT Wijaya Karya Bangunan Gedung Tbk provides building construction services in Indonesia. The company offers general civil construction services, such as foundation and structural work, mechanical work, electrical, plumbing, lighting, and architecture, as well as interior and exterior work, including landscape and hardscape work. It also provides precast blocks, precast columns, hollow core slab, and precast concrete faÃ§ade. The company constructs academic facilities, airports, apartments, commercial facilities, hospitals, hotels, offices, and sports facilities. It serves governments and private sectors. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Wijaya Karya Bangunan Gedung Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk.

WEHA.JK.summary: PT WEHA Transportasi Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides passenger transportation services in Indonesia. The company operates in three segments: Passenger Transportation Services, Inter-Cities Transportation Services, and Other services. It operates bus rental business under the White Horse Deluxe Coach (WHDC) brand to serve domestic and international corporate customers, school kid's shuttle, employee's shuttle, weddings, and passenger transport for funeral home. The company also provides intercity shuttle services on the Jakarta-Bandung route under the Day Trans brand, and for the Central Java and surrounding areas with the Yogyakarta, Semarang, Solo, Salatiga, and Jepara routes, as well as online booking system. In addition, it offers car rental services; and sightseeing tour services, such as bus and tour guide. The company was formerly known as PT Panorama Transportasi Tbk and changed its name to PT WEHA Transportasi Indonesia Tbk in June 2015. PT WEHA Transportasi Indonesia Tbk was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia.

WIKA.JK.summary: PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk operates as an integrated construction company in Indonesia and internationally. The company's Infrastructure and Building segment provides civil construction services, such as general construction and infrastructure, including roads, bridges, harbors, airports, dams, and irrigation, as well as construction service on toll concession. Its Energy and Industrial Plant segment is involved in energy; engineering, procurement and construction; and field operations and maintenance of the power plants; and construction of oil and gas, petrochemical, cement, power, biofuel, fertilizer, and cooking oil plants. The company's Industry segment produces precast concrete products, such as PC polishing, PC piles, railway sleeper CP, bridge concrete, sheet pile, PC pipes, RC box culvert, marine structure CP, HCS, PC cylinder, and rigid pavement fabricated; steel fabrication by producing steel construction products, aluminum casting, steel frame structure, conveyor, pipe rack, telecommunication tower, electricity transmission tower, steel frame bridge, steel tank, silo, hopper, pressure vessel, welded beam, and other steel plate work and aluminum casting and plastic injection; and offers bitumen, including granular and extraction asphalt. It's Realty and Property segment engages in the real estate, property services, and other services, such as landed house, high-rise building, and industrial estate. PT Wijaya Karya (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

WINS.JK.summary: PT Wintermar Offshore Marine Tbk supporting services for the offshore transportation for the oil and gas industry in Indonesia, Malaysia, Brunei, Myanmar, Thailand, India, Bangladesh, Papua New Guinea, Micronesia, the Middle East, and Africa. The company operates through three segments: Charter of Own Vessels, Charter of Third Party Vessels, and Other Services. Its fleet includes platform supply vessels, anchor handling tug supply vessels, anchor handling tug vessels, fast utility vessels, fast multi-purpose supply vessels, azimuth stern drive tugs, utility vessels, crew boats, landing crafts, oil barges, heavy load deck barges, and tug boats. The company also offers rig moving and anchor handling, crew change and rig supply, firefighting and emergency rescue, air diving and remotely operated vehicle support, pipe tailing support, seismic survey support services, as well as ship management and other services. It operates a fleet of approximately 48 offshore support vessels. The company was formerly known as PT Swakarya Mulia Shipping and changed its name to PT Wintermar Offshore Marine Tbk in September 2010. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

WSKT.JK.summary: PT Waskita Karya (Persero) Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the engineering, procurement, and construction works in Indonesia. It constructs building projects, transportation facilities, and water resources and energy projects; invests in various toll roads; and operates realty projects. The company is also involved in the hotel management business; building and equipment rental business; and production of precast concrete. In addition, it operates as an independent power producer; and develops real estate properties. PT Waskita Karya (Persero) Tbk was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
